Tadić: Ovako nešto nikada nisam doživeo
05 Nov 2019, 23:56 by Darko
Ajaks je bio na dobrom putu da nokautira Čelsi na Stamford Bridžu. Vodio je klub iz Amsterdama sa 4:1, ali se za tren sve okrenulo. Italijanski sudija Đanluka Roki je u istoj akciji isključio Blinda i Veltmana i dosudio penal za Čelsi, pa na kraju „kopljanici“ mogu da budu zadovoljni što nisu poraženi.
Kapiten Ajaksa Dušan Tadić posle uzbudljivog meča u Londonu ipak nije krio da je razočaran.
– Sve je išlo kako treba a onda je neko iznenada uništio utakmicu. Kako je moguće pokazati dva crvena kartona u istoj akciji, stvarno ne razumem to, rekao je Tadić.
Srpski reprezentativac je dodao da je ponosan na svoje saigrače.
– Ponosan sam na svoj tim jer smo uspeli da izdržimo sa devet igrača. Ali, moramo da budemo ljuti posle svega. Nikada ranije ovako nešto nisam doživeo, rekao je Tadić.

Tadic: I've never experienced anything like this
05 Nov 2019, 22:56 by Darko
Ajax was well on his way to knocking out Chelsea at Stamford Bridge. He led the club from Amsterdam 4-1, but in a moment everything turned. Italian judge Gianluca Rocky in the same action excluded Blind and Veltman and awarded a penalty to Chelsea, so in the end the "Spearmen" can be pleased that they were not defeated.
Ajax captain Dusan Tadic did not hide his disappointment after an exciting match in London.
- Everything went right and then someone suddenly ruined the game. How it's possible to show two red cards in the same action, I really don't understand that, Tadic said.
The Serbian national team added that he is proud of his teammates.
- I'm proud of my team because we were able to withstand nine players. But we have to be angry after all. I have never experienced anything like this before, Tadic said.
